titles.title: To redesignate the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in the State of Missouri as the "Gateway Arch National Park".
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-534.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 399.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
This bill designates the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in Missouri as the "Gateway Arch National Park."
